sentences.en: "Dr Campbell," he said, clearly surprised. "What are you doing here?"
sentences.cn: “坎贝尔医生，”他显然很惊讶地说道，“您怎么在这儿？”

sentences.en: "I don'tagree," she said, surprised at the strength in her own voice.
sentences.cn: “我不同意，”她说道，对自己的声音如此响亮有力而感到惊讶。

sentences.en: Anne was both flattered and surprised by Danny's attentiveness to her.
sentences.cn: 丹尼的大献殷勤让安妮受宠若惊。

sentences.en: Chang seemed surprised to find the big living-room empty.
sentences.cn: 张看到偌大的客厅里空无一人，似乎很惊讶。

sentences.en: Do not be surprised if, initially, she directs her anger at you.
sentences.cn: 如果一上来她就冲你发火，不必惊讶。

sentences.en: Don’t be surprised if the interviewer is rather direct.
sentences.cn: 如果采访的人说话比较直接，也不要吃惊。

sentences.en: He had a surprised look on his face.
He looked surprised to see Cassie standing by the front door.
sentences.cn: 他看到卡西站在前门旁，显得很吃惊。

sentences.en: He was surprised by the venomous tone of the anonymous calls.
sentences.cn: 那些匿名电话的恶毒语气很令他吃惊。

sentences.en: He was surprised they had married — they had seemed so different.
sentences.cn: 他俩居然结婚了——这让他非常惊讶，因为他们实在是太不一样了。

sentences.en: I was surprised at the cross-section of people there.
sentences.cn: 那里的一些典型人物让我感到惊讶。

sentences.en: I would be surprised, actually, if he left Birmingham.
sentences.cn: 如果他要离开伯明翰，说真的，我会很惊讶。

sentences.en: I wouldn’t be surprised if she married that fellow.
sentences.cn: 要是她嫁给那家伙，我不会感到意外。

sentences.en: My voice surprised me; it was even and emotionless.
sentences.cn: 我的声音听起来心平气和、不露一丝感情，这让我自己颇感惊讶。

sentences.en: She was hitting on me and I was surprised and flattered.
sentences.cn: 她在挑逗我，这让我感到既惊讶又受宠若惊。

sentences.en: She was surprised at the urgency in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他语调中透着急迫，这让她很吃惊。

sentences.en: This lady was genuinely surprised at what happened to her pet.
sentences.cn: 这位女士对发生在自己宠物身上的事感到非常惊讶。

sentences.en: We were rather surprised by their sporting and correct behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他们富有体育精神而且举止得体，让我们感到相当惊讶。

sentences.en: Were you surprised that his disease progressed so quickly?
sentences.cn: 他的病情发展得这么快，您是否感到意外？

words.tran_cn: 使惊奇；意外发现（surprise的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 对…感到惊奇；使…感到意外；对……很吃惊

trans.tran_en: If you are surprised at something, you have a feeling of surprise, because it is unexpected or unusual

trans.tran_cn: 使惊奇（surprise的过去分词形式）
